alert.note: Alert for Culberson; Jeff Davis; Reeves (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 15 at 7:58PM CDT until September 15 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN REEVES...NORTH CENTRAL JEFF DAVIS AND SOUTHEASTERN CULBERSON COUNTIES... At 758 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kent, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kent. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 169 and 195. Interstate 20 between mile markers 0 and 4. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
